title: Toonsylvania
overview: Stephen Spielberg's first ever animated TV show from Dreamworks SKG. It's a side-splitting, full-length animated creature feature on TV! Join Phil - a nearly brainless monster, Igor - a lovable but hapless and Dr. Vic Frankenstein - the egomanical boss in an animated excursion to the other side, where monsters carry teddy bears and the Doctor's always cooking up some new adventure.
